Ping Module¶

This is the main module for Ping portion of homework

my_ping.form_args(args, start_time)¶

Forms packet for ping program by using raw sockets

Parameters:

  • args (ArgumentParser) – ArgumentParser object with parsed arguments

  • start_time (float) – Time object meant to represent start of ping process

Returns:

sr_args, kwargs for srloop() in main function

Return type:

Dictionary

my_ping.form_pkt(args)¶

Forms packet for ping program by using raw sockets

Parameters:

args (ArgumentParser) – ArgumentParser object with parsed arguments

Returns:

pkt, a crafted packet using scapy raw sockets

Return type:

scapy.layers.inet.IP / scapy.layers.inet.ICMP / scapy.packet.Padding

my_ping.setup_parser()¶

Sets up the argument parser for the ping program

Returns:

parser, an initialized ArgumentParser object

Return type:

ArgumentParser
